name: Place
description: Entities that have a somewhat fixed, physical extension.
title: Place

fields.name: globalLocationNumber
fields.title: globalLocationNumber
fields.description: The Global Location Number (GLN, sometimes also referred to as International Location Number or ILN) of the respective organization, person, or place. The GLN is a 13-digit number used to identify parties and physical locations.

fields.name: maximumAttendeeCapacity
fields.title: maximumAttendeeCapacity
fields.description: The total number of individuals that may attend an event or venue.

fields.name: map
fields.title: map
fields.description: A URL to a map of the place.

fields.name: branchCode
fields.title: branchCode
fields.description:
A short textual code (also called "store code") that uniquely identifies a place of business. The code is typically assigned by the parentOrganization and used in structured URLs.

For example, in the URL http://www.starbucks.co.uk/store-locator/etc/detail/3047 the code "3047" is a branchCode for a particular branch.

fields.name: geo
fields.title: geo
fields.description: The geo coordinates of the place.

fields.name: publicAccess
fields.title: publicAccess
fields.description: A flag to signal that the Place is open to public visitors. If this property is omitted there is no assumed default boolean value

fields.name: containsPlace
fields.title: containsPlace
fields.description: The basic containment relation between a place and another that it contains.

fields.name: isAccessibleForFree
fields.title: isAccessibleForFree
fields.description: A flag to signal that the item, event, or place is accessible for free.

fields.name: containedIn
fields.title: containedIn
fields.description: The basic containment relation between a place and one that contains it.
